definition: (of tumors, e.g.) slow to heal or develop and usually painless
details:
adjective
- (of tumors, e.g.) slow to heal or develop and usually painless
= example: (of tumors, e.g.) slow to heal or develop and usually painless
- disinclined to work or exertion
= synonyms: faineant, lazy, otiose, slothful, work-shy
